content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello there, Haoyu Wang! I hope you find the apartment to your liking. As you may know, the real estate market in München can be quite competitive, and I'm looking to find a tenant who appreciates the quality of this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's a prime location, close to all important facilities, which I'm sure you'll find quite convenient.

So, let's discuss the rental price. I'm open to offers, but I must stress that I'm looking for a fair market price that reflects the value of this property. What is your understanding of the going rate for such an apartment in this area?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that you're offering a high-quality apartment in a very desirable location. However, as a student, I have to be mindful of my budget. I've been looking at similar apartments in the area, and I believe that a fair market price would be around 1000 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities. Is this something that we could discuss further?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 1000 Euro per month inclusive of utilities is certainly an attractive offer, considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location. However, as a landlord, I have to ensure that I'm not underselling my property. Let's negotiate a bit further. How about we start at 1200 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities? This would still be a competitive price for an apartment of this caliber in the München city center. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While 1200 Euro per month is a fair price for the location and quality of the apartment, I must remain within my budget as a student. Let's find a middle ground. How about we meet at 1100 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities? This would be a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 1100 Euro per month inclusive of all utilities is a step in the right direction, but I must insist on a price that reflects the investment I've made in this property. Let's try to find a balance that is agreeable to both of us. How about we split the difference and settle at 1150 Euro per month inclusive of all utilities? This would be a fair market price, and I believe it would be a mutually satisfactory arrangement. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Your offer of 1150 Euro per month inclusive of all utilities is quite fair, considering the location and the amenities. I agree to the price of 1150 Euro per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Haoyu Wang! I agree to the price of 1150 Euro per month inclusive of all utilities as well. This is a fair deal for both parties. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the lease agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm pleased with our agreement on the rental price of 1150 Euro per month inclusive of all utilities. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have reached a price that is acceptable to both of us. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
